data.comment: The big names in today's match at Johan Cruijff Arena have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Johan Cruijff Arena.
In the minute 10, Ajax's Dusan Tadic scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Mohammed Kudus is booked for the home team.
Goal! Ajax extend their lead to 2-0 through Zakaria Labyad.
In the minute 35, That's a fine assist from Noussair Mazraoui.
Bas Nijhuis blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 61, Waalwijk make their second substitution with Morad el Haddouti replacing James Efmorfidis.
Sylla Sow is replacing Lennerd Daneels for the away team.
Luuk Wouters (Waalwijk) sees red and is sent off in Amsterdam!
In the minute 69, Erik ten Hag is making the team's second substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Lassina Franck Traore replacing Zakaria Labyad.
The home team have replaced Antony Santos with David Neres. This is the first substitution made today by Erik ten Hag.
The away team replace Finn Stokkers with Thierry Lutonda.
In the minute 73, Ajax move into a 3-0 lead through a Lisandro Martinez header.
Dusan Tadic with an assist there.
Erik ten Hag (Ajax) is making a third substitution, with Sergino Dest replacing Daley Blind.
In the minute 83, Klaas-Jan Huntelaar is on a sub for Quincy Promes for Ajax.
Noa Lang is replacing Dusan Tadic for Ajax at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Hans Mulder is on a sub for Nicolas Olsak for Waalwijk.
The match has come to a close in Amsterdam. The final score is 3-0.
